snippet: The first three runners to complete the New York Marathon after the official cutoff were happy just to finish, and to have forged new friendships.
abstract: New York City Marathon officially ends at 7:30 pm, but Shari Diaz and Wicki Ball are first two runners to cross finish line just after official time cutoff; they place 49,467th and 49,468th on total list of finishers, but their results are not counted.
lead_paragraph: The first three runners to complete the New York Marathon after the official cutoff were happy just to finish, and to have forged new friendships.

headline.main: Unofficially 49,467th, but First Among the New York City Marathon’s ‘Almost’ Crew
headline.print_headline: Unofficially 49,467th, but First Among Marathon’s ‘Almost’ Crew
